wikipedia_page.main: Sir Percy Alden (6 June 1865 – 30 June 1944) was a British social worker, land reformer and radical Liberal Party politician.Born in Oxford, he was the third son of Isaac Alden, a master butcher and Harriet née Kemp. After serving twice as a Member of Parliament, he was killed in June 1944 by a German V-1 flying bomb.
